title: Comfy Photo Recovery v4.0 with Key [TorDigger]

Comfy Photo Recovery

Comfy Photo Recovery - a program through which the process of recovering digital photos will be available to any user. The utility restores deleted photos from cameras, memory cards, cameras, various HDD and USB drives, memory cards, mobile phones.

You lost files can be recovered even if the camera memory card or a logical drive has been formatted or deleted, the data were lost during a virus attack or hardware failure. Thanks to a new algorithm of advanced disk analysis, the software recovers the photos that other tools do not even detect!

Key features:

- Support for all popular types of memory cards, various USB and HDD devices, cameras, etc.
- Support for VFAT, FAT12/16/32, NTFS/NTFS4/NTFS5
- Preview of deleted images to their recovery

- Reclaimed digital photos in RAW format
- Reclaimed images from deleted partition
- Easy-to-use photo recovery process poschagovy
- In-depth disk scanning using advanced scanning algorithms and data analysis

Win XP/Vista/7/8
